# Tomas Ruiz

I am a doctoral researcher at the Ludwig-Maximilian-University of Munich. My research area is the intersection of Machine Learning and Social Media, particularly on multi-modal understanding.

## Experience

In previous jobs, I have worked as a software engineer in different corporations (Amazon, Allianz, BMW) and Startups. The projects ranged from optimization algorithms to backend-engineering. You can find my CV on LinkedIn.

## Education

* 2021, Technical University of Munich: Master of Science in Computer Science
* 2018, Technical University of Munich: Bachelor of Science in Engineering Science
